additionalFields.note:
={{ 
(() => {
  const text = $item("0").$node["Webhook"].json["body"]["activity"]["activityTemplateId"]).social_network;
  
  // Primeiro: decodificar caracteres especiais
  let cleaned = text
    .replace(/–/g, 'â€“')
    .replace(/í/g, 'Ã­')
    .replace(/ç/g, 'Ã§')
    .replace(/ã/g, 'Ã£')
    .replace(/õ/g, 'Ãµ')
    .replace(/á/g, 'Ã¡')
    .replace(/é/g, 'Ã©')
    .replace(/ó/g, 'Ã³')
    .replace(/ú/g, 'Ãº')
    .replace(/ê/g, 'Ãª')
    .replace(/ô/g, 'Ã´')
    .replace(/&/g, '&')
    .replace(/ /g, ' ')
    .replace(/É/g, 'Ã‰'); // Corrige o É que apareceu

  // Processar tags HTML e converter para \n literais
  cleaned = cleaned
    .replace(/<h[1-6][^>]*>/gi, '\\n') // Headers viram \n
    .replace(/<\/h[1-6]>/gi, '\\n')
    .replace(/<p[^>]*>/gi, '\\n')
    .replace(/<\/p>/gi, '\\n')
    .replace(/<br\s*\/?>/gi, '\\n')
    .replace(/<ul[^>]*>/gi, '\\n')
    .replace(/<\/ul>/gi, '\\n')
    .replace(/<li[^>]*>/gi, '\\nâ€¢ ') // List items com \n e bullet
    .replace(/<\/li>/gi, '\\n')
    .replace(/<hr[^>]*>/gi, '\\n---\\n')
    .replace(/<[^>]*>/g, ' ') // Remove todas outras tags
    .replace(/\s+/g, ' ') // Remove mÃºltiplos espaÃ§os
    .trim();

  // Adicionar quebras lÃ³gicas baseadas nos emojis/seÃ§Ãµes
  cleaned = cleaned
    .replace(/(ðŸ”Ž|ðŸ§©|ðŸŽ¯|ðŸ’¡|ðŸ¤”|ðŸ“…)/g, '\\n$1')
    .replace(/\s*\.\s*/g, '. ')
    .replace(/\s*,\s*/g, ', ')
    .replace(/\s*:\s*/g, ': ');

  return cleaned;
})()
}}
